personalInfo.name: Naga Sai Manikya Sri Vishnu Manepalli

about.description: I am a passionate and dedicated Computer Science Engineering student at the Indian Institute of Technology, Ropar. I am enthusiastic about software development and have a keen interest in backend development, system testing, and deployment. I am adept at leveraging my skills in Java, Spring Boot, MySQL, and RESTful WebServices to deliver high-quality projects. I am a quick learner and a team player, with a strong work ethic and a commitment to achieving project goals. I am seeking opportunities to further enhance my skills and contribute to the growth of an innovative organization.
about.hobbies: Playing Chess, Reading Books, Watching Movies, Listening to Music
about.skills: Java, Spring Boot, MySQL, RESTful WebServices, gRPC, System Testing, Deployment

education.institute: Board of Secondary Education, Andhra Pradesh

experience.title: Software Development Internship
responsibilities: Pioneered the migration from Monolithic architecture to gRPC Microservices, elevating scalability and system performance.
Enabled the integration with third-party systems, implementing reward structures upon users' successful completion of milestones set by the business team.
Led the deprecation of Rest APIs and conducted comprehensive code cleanups, culminating in reduced build times and an optimized, maintainable codebase.
Managed Database operations meticulously, ensuring data consistency and enforcing essential constraints for robust data integrity.
Proficiently resolved debugging challenges identified by QA, enhancing product quality through systematic testing.

Leveraged expertise in REST APIs, debugging, Gitlab, Jira, IntelliJ Git, Kubernetes, Microservices, Backend Development, MySQL, Java, Spring Boot, gRPC, and System Testing to successfully achieve project goals.

projects.name: Development Engineering Project
projects.description: Executed a web-based platform dedicated to managing and monitoring research and development grants. Designed for the exclusive use of the RnD grants division at IIT Ropar.
projects.skills: PostgreSQL, Express, React, Node.js for Architecture and Render for deployment

projects.name: Student Academic Portal
projects.description: Implemented a sophisticated multi-user command-line interface database application to optimize academic management within an educational institution. Developed the application using Java and PostgreSQL, skillfully integrating real-world functionalities for enhanced academic operations.

projects.name: Railway Reservation System
projects.description: Designed and developed a Java-based railway reservation system with a PostgreSQL database. Implemented multi-threading for efficient train booking and search operations, ensuring smooth execution within the designated schedule.

projects.name: Cucu Compiler Design
projects.description: Collaboratively designed and developed the CUCU (Compiler U Can Understand) compiler for a simplified C language. Utilized Flex and Bison, enabling the identification of lexical and syntactical errors.

projects.name: Car Parking System
projects.description: Developed a digital logic project focusing on car parking management and monitoring in high-traffic areas, enabling users to conveniently check parking vacancies. Utilized skills in Verilog and applied digital logic design principles.
